languages.text: "В старом мосту действительно оказался тайник! К сожалению, уже разграбленный".
"There truly was a cache hidden in the old bridge! Sadly, it had been plundered already."
languages.original_text: "В старом мосту действительно оказался тайник! К сожалению, уже разграбленный".

traits.locale_text: "There was indeed a cache hidden in the old bridge! Sadly, it had been plundered already."

languages.text: 「本当に古い橋に宝が隠されていた！残念ながら、既に略奪された後だったが」
languages.original_text: "There truly was a cache hidden in the old bridge! Sadly, it had been plundered already."

traits.locale_text: 「本当に古い橋に宝が隠されていた！残念ながら、既に略奪された後だったが」

languages.text: “那座旧桥里真的有个藏匿点！遗憾的是，里面的东西已经被拿走了。”
languages.original_text: "There truly was a cache hidden in the old bridge! Sadly, it had been plundered already."

traits.locale_text: “那座旧桥里真的有个藏匿点！遗憾的是，里面的东西已经被拿走了。”

languages.text: «¡Sí que había un escondrijo en el puente antiguo! Por desgracia, ya lo habían saqueado».
languages.original_text: "There truly was a cache hidden in the old bridge! Sadly, it had been plundered already."

traits.locale_text: «¡Sí que había un escondrijo en el puente antiguo! Por desgracia, ya lo habían saqueado».

languages.text: « Il y avait bien une cachette dans le vieux pont ! Malheureusement, elle avait déjà été pillée. »
languages.original_text: "There truly was a cache hidden in the old bridge! Sadly, it had been plundered already."

traits.locale_text: « Il y avait bien une cachette dans le vieux pont ! Malheureusement, elle avait déjà été pillée. »

languages.text: "In der alten Brücke gab es wirklich ein Lager! Leider hatte jemand es bereits geplündert."
languages.original_text: "There truly was a cache hidden in the old bridge! Sadly, it had been plundered already."

traits.locale_text: "In der alten Brücke gab es wirklich ein Lager! Leider hatte jemand es bereits geplündert."

languages.text: "Eski köprüde sahiden de saklı bir zula varmış! Ne yazık ki çoktan yağmalamışlar."
languages.original_text: "There truly was a cache hidden in the old bridge! Sadly, it had been plundered already."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçekten de eski köprüde saklı bir zula varmış! Ne yazık ki çoktan yağmalamışlar."
